sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnproxyinfo ( proxy_id , proxy_nm , proxy_ip , proxy_port , trget_svc_nm , svc_dc , svc_ip , svc_port , svc_sttus , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm ) VALUES ( #proxyId# , #proxyNm# , #proxyIp# , #proxyPort# , #trgetSvcNm# , #svcDc# , #svcIp# , #svcPort# , #svcSttus# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE() )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnproxyinfo SET proxy_id = #proxyId# , proxy_nm = #proxyNm# , proxy_ip = #proxyIp# , proxy_port = #proxyPort# , trget_svc_nm = #trgetSvcNm# , svc_dc = #svcDc# , svc_ip = #svcIp# , svc_port = #svcPort# , svc_sttus = #svcSttus# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE() WHERE 1 = 1 AND proxy_id = #proxyId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnproxyinfo WHERE 1 = 1 AND proxy_id = #proxyId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT proxy_id , proxy_nm , proxy_ip , proxy_port , trget_svc_nm , svc_dc , svc_ip , svc_port , svc_sttus , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM comtnproxyinfo WHERE proxy_id = #proxyId#

SELECT proxy_id , proxy_nm , proxy_ip , proxy_port , trget_svc_nm , svc_dc , svc_ip , svc_port , svc_sttus , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM comtnproxyinfo WHERE 1=1
proxy_id = #searchKeyword#
proxy_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY proxy_id DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnproxyinfo WHERE 1=1
proxy_id = #searchKeyword#
proxy_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
